title: SeM1:7-8
text: Develop and demonstrate strategies for managing and expressing one's own emotions to persevere in challenging situations. (Communication)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can identify the difference between healthy and unhealthy stress levels.
I can apply coping skills to process thoughts, express my emotions and manage stressful situations.
I can reframe a challenging situation into a positive or learning opportunity for growth.
